phase.title: Phase
phase.description: Choose discovery of names (Phase 1) or enrichment of contacts (Phase 2).

city.title: City/Market
city.description: Target market to filter results and seed web queries.

limitPerSource.title: Max agents per source
limitPerSource.description: Soft cap of names to collect from each directory in Phase 1.

sources.title: Site adapters
sources.description: Which directories to crawl during discovery (Phase 1).

datasetNamePhase1.title: Dataset name for Phase 1 (optional)
datasetNamePhase1.description: Dataset name tag used for Phase 1 results (names).

namesCsvUrl.title: Names CSV for Phase 2 (optional)
namesCsvUrl.description: Public CSV URL with a 'name' column or one name per line for enrichment.

bingApiKey.title: Bing Web Search API key (optional)
bingApiKey.description: Optional key to speed up Phase 2 searches (actor works without it).

maxPagesPerName.title: Max result pages to visit per name
maxPagesPerName.description: Safety cap for the number of pages to follow for each name in Phase 2.

proxyGroups.title: Apify proxy groups (optional)
proxyGroups.description: e.g., RESIDENTIAL. Leave empty to run without proxy.
